name: Recession
description: Recession is a 4v1 cop vs. robbers multiplayer shooter. Four robbers attempt to rob a bank full of money bags while a single cop with heavy armor and weapons tries to take all 4 down before they can escape with the cash.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Intel i3/AMD Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Intel i5/AMD Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 7970/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any sound card Additional Notes: Game was tested on AMD Radeon HD 7870 with an Intel i5 7400 CPU with 90 FPS on highest settings at 1080p.
